output:
Remember Me
Remember me when I'm gone away
Gone far away into the silent land
When you can no more hold me by the hand
My heart turned to go yet turning stay
Better by far you should forget and smile
And that you should remember and be sad
Better by far you should forget and smile
And that you should remember and be sad
Remember me when no more day by day
You tell me of a future that you planned
Only remember me you'll understand
We'll be late to ground seven or play
Better by far you should forget and smile
And that you should remember and be sad
Better by far you should forget and smile
And that you should remember and be sad
Yet if you should forget me for a while
And after I'd remembered in a dream
Or if the darkness and corruption leave
I'll ask each of the thoughts that once I had
Better by far you should forget and smile
And that you should remember and be sad
Better by far you should forget and smile
And that you should remember and be sad
Then that I've far you shouldn't forget and smile
And that you should remember and be sad
Better by far you shouldn't forget and smile
And that you should remember and be sad
And that you should remember and be sad
